text:
A national communications framework for boosting vaccine confidence amongst the BAME population in the UK is overdue. Read OVID's thoughts on boosting uptake in BAME communities here: https://t.co/j9rN4MxbfG 

#reinventhealth #BAME #vaccine #COVID19 #coronavirus #healthcomms https://t.co/JC6z4xtE9D
